text: Rental fleets and utility trailers, owned by any person or firm engaging in the business of renting such vehicle, shall be extended full interstate and intrastate privileges, provided the following:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-112.

1973 Ed., § 40-112.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-157, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1505.04.

DC CODE § 50-1505.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Such vehicle or trailers are part of a rental fleet and are identifiable as being a part of such fleet; and
Such person or firm registers a portion of said vehicles or trailers as provided in § 50-1505.03.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
